CustomField.description: For HR Enhancement Vacancy Report (Andy's). This serves as column head custom label translation
CustomField.formula: CASE( General_Recruitment_Status_2__c, "Packet to HR - Part 1 Received", "Initial Division Submission To HR", "Packet to HR - Part 1 Under Review", "Under Review by HR Analyst", "Part 1 Return to Program", "Return to Program Part I", "Job Post Date", "Form 1 Approved and Job Posted", "Packet to HR - Part 2 Under Review", "Under Review by HR Analyst", "Part 2 Return to Program", "Return to Program Part II", "Release Applications", "Apps Released To Division", "Packet to HR - Part 3 Received", "Packet to HR - Part 3 Received", "Packet to HR - Part 3 Under Review", "In HR Review Process", "Minimum Qualification Withhold", "Minimum Qualification Withhold", "HR Final Packet - Manager Approved", "HR Approved", "Candidate Accepts", "Final Offer Accepted", "" )
CustomField.label: Vacancy Report Summary
